title: FusionX Neon Night 2025
shortDescription: A high-energy collision of music, motion graphics, and interactive light sculptures.
longDescription: Step into an immersive neon universe where DJs, live performers, and generative visuals sync perfectly with the crowd. FusionX Neon Night is designed as a 360Â° sensory experience, combining cutting-edge lighting rigs, laser mapping, and interactive installations.

title: Immersive Storyscapes Live
shortDescription: An experimental theatre showcase blending live performance, projection mapping, and spatial audio.
longDescription: Immersive Storyscapes Live pushes the boundaries of theatre with reactive projections, binaural sound design, and actor-audience interplay. Each scene reconfigures the stage and light to pull viewers deeper into the narrative.

title: PulseFest 2024
shortDescription: A multi-stage festival featuring EDM, hip-hop, and live VJ sets across three neon arenas.
longDescription: PulseFest 2024 brought together 20+ artists, 3 immersive stages, and dynamic LED tunnel entries that reacted to crowd movement. The event set a new bar for synchronized lighting and crowd interaction.

title: Campus Rush Tour 2024
shortDescription: A travelling IP with live acts, influencer meetups, and pop-up neon zones.
longDescription: Campus Rush Tour 2024 activated 12 campuses with performance stages, content creator lounges, and AR-powered photo ops. Each stop was tailored to the campus culture while preserving the core FusionX neon identity.

title: Aurora Brand Launch Experience
shortDescription: A premium closed-door product reveal with kinetic light sculptures and live scoring.
longDescription: Designed as an invite-only premiere, Aurora Brand Launch featured choreographed reveals, live scoring by a chamber ensemble, and kinetic neon structures that morphed with each chapter of the story.
